recipesJson.name: pb & julian
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
this is a remix PB and Jam monster. #FreeAssange

made on LIVE MIXING

reviews.text: I like it, first time using Peanut Butter, this isnt too bad.
Tasty little recipe. Dropped the peanut butter to 4 and added .5 % boysenberry to give it a little extra jammies. Reminds of grilled peanut butter I ate as a kid.
